00062 class MMCDBIPositionIterator: public Iterator{
00064     int position;
00065 
00067     MMCDBItem *mmcdbi;
00068 public:
00070     MMCDBIPositionIterator(MMCDBItem *mmcdbi){
00071         this->mmcdbi = mmcdbi;
00072         position = 0;
00073     }
00074 
00076     virtual void Do (LinkedListable *data);
00077 
00079     int Position(){
00080         if (mmcdbi != NULL) return -1;
00081         return position;
00082     }
00083 };

00088 OBJECT_DLL(MMCDBItem)
00089 class MMCDBItem: public LinkedListable,public Object{
00090     OBJECT_DLL_STUFF(MMCDBItem)
00091 
00092     friend class MMCDB;
00093 
00094 private: // loaded by Init()
00096     void *                  address;
00097 
00099     FString                 className;
00100 
00102     FString                 variableName;
00103 
00105     int *                   arrayDimensions;
00106 
00108     const ClassStructure *  classStructure;
00109 
00110 private: // loaded by Populate()
00112     LinkedListHolder        elements;
00113 
00114 private:
00115 
00117     static void CopyDimensions(
00118         int *                   destination,
00119         int                     maxDim,
00120         const int *             source,
00121         int                     numberOfDimensions);
00122 
00124     static bool CompareDimensions(
00125         const int *             destination,
00126         int                     maxDim,
00127         const int *             source,
00128         int                     sSize);
00129 
00131     void CleanUp();
00132 public:
00134     MMCDBItem();
00135 
00137     virtual ~MMCDBItem(){
00138         CleanUp();
00139     }
00140 
00142     bool Init(
00143         void *                  address,
00144         const char *            className,
00145         const char *            variableName,
00146         int                     numberOfDimensions=0,
00147         int *                   dimensions=NULL);
00148 
00152     bool Populate(int index = -1);
00153 
00155     bool UnPopulate(){
00156         elements.CleanUp();
00157         return True;
00158     }
00159 
00160 public:
00161 
00163     bool IsPointer() {
00164         if (className == "const char*" ) return False;
00165         if (className == "char*" ) return False;
00166         int pos = className.Size()-1;
00167         char c = className.Buffer()[pos];
00168         return (c=='*') || (c=='&');
00169     }
00170 
00172     bool IsArray() {
00173         return (arrayDimensions != NULL);
00174     }
00175 
00177     int NumberOfElements(){
00178         if (IsArray()) return arrayDimensions[0];
00179         return elements.ListSize();
00180     }
00181 
00183     MMCDBItem * GetElement(int index){
00184         if (IsArray()){
00185             Populate(index);
00186             char name[32];
00187             sprintf(name,"[%i]",index);
00188             MMCDBISearchFilter mmcdbisf(name);
00189             return dynamic_cast<MMCDBItem *>(elements.ListSearch(&mmcdbisf));
00190         }
00191         return dynamic_cast<MMCDBItem *>(elements.ListPeek(index));
00192     }
00193 
00195     MMCDBItem * GetElement(const char *name){
00196         if (name == NULL) return NULL;
00197         int nameLen = strlen(name);
00198 
00199         if (IsArray() && (name[0] == '[') && (name[nameLen-1] == ']')){
00200 
00201             int index = atoi(name+1);
00202             return GetElement(index);
00203         }
00204         MMCDBISearchFilter mmcdbisf(name);
00205         return dynamic_cast<MMCDBItem *>(elements.ListSearch(&mmcdbisf));
00206     }
00207 
00209     int GetElementPosition(MMCDBItem *mmcdbi ){
00210         if (mmcdbi == NULL) return -1;
00211         MMCDBIPositionIterator mmcdbipi(mmcdbi);
00212         elements.ListIterate(&mmcdbipi);
00213         return mmcdbipi.Position();
00214     }
00215 
00217     void Show(Streamable &s,const char *indent);
00218 
00220     const char *ClassName() const{
00221         return className.Buffer();
00222     }
00223 
00225     const char *VariableName() const{
00226         return variableName.Buffer();
00227     }
00228 
00230     void *Address() const{
00231         return address;
00232     }
00233 
00235     bool IsFinal() {
00236         if (className == "FString" ) return True;
00237         return (NumberOfElements() == 0);
00238     }
00239 
00241     int NumberOfArrayDimensions(){
00242         if (arrayDimensions == NULL) return 0;
00243         int ix = 0;
00244         while (arrayDimensions[ix] > 0) ix++;
00245         return ix;
00246     }
00247 
00249     int *GetArrayDimensions(){
00250         return arrayDimensions;
00251     }
00252 
00254     int TotalSize(int fromDim=0){
00255         if (arrayDimensions == NULL) return 1;
00256         int size = 1;
00257         int ix = fromDim;
00258         while (arrayDimensions[ix] > 0){
00259             size *= arrayDimensions[ix];
00260             ix++;
00261         }
00262         return size;
00263     }
00264 
00266     bool IsFloat(){
00267         if (className == "float") return True;
00268         if (className == "double") return True;
00269         return False;
00270     }
00271 
00273     int ElementSize(){
00274         if (classStructure) return classStructure->Size();
00275         return -1;
00276     }
00277 
00278 };
